Notes reviewer 1:
Don't report the ESS for each arm, but globally for the whole reweighted IPD arms: 1710. The number reported in Table 1 are just the sum of the weights, not the ESS

Not any outcome that stands out, but outcomes reported for every STs tested, without any pooled estimate. Therefore the first one reported in the results text happens to be ST4: 0.89 <0.001 (**one sided pvalue**); 0.91 <0.001
